biotools.summary: HexSE is a Python module designed to simulate sequence evolution along a phylogeny while considering the coding context of the nucleotides. The ultimate porpuse of HexSE is to account for multiple selection preasures on Overlapping Reading Frames.

bioschemas.name: HexSE
